attributes.action: accept and act upon the disgust of the general public over  parliaments opt out of the freedom of information  act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You, the parliament, our servants, should not expect to be treated any differently from the people who employ you. You show us contempt in expecting us to accept this.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/donttrustthem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
